snippet: While Roche's chairman claims that the Swiss drug maker has other options if its Illumina takeover bid fails, it is not clear that the alternatives will prove as attractive.
abstract: While Roche's chairman claims that the Swiss drug maker has other options if its Illumina takeover bid fails, it is not clear that the alternatives will prove as attractive.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Weighing Roche's Alternatives to an Illumina Deal
